mapper.update:
update loan_pay_plan
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trans_main_id = #{transMainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repayment_method = #{repaymentMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repayment_total = #{repaymentTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayment_capital = #{repaymentCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayment_capital_time = #{repaymentCapitalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
repayment_interest = #{repaymentInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayment_interest_time = #{repaymentInterestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
overdue_days = #{overdueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
period = #{period,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
overdue_interest_total = #{overdueInterestTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
overdue_capital = #{overdueCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
overdue_interest = #{overdueInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
compensate = #{compensate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fees_total = #{feesTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sevice_fee = #{seviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trans_type = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
advance_total = #{advanceTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
advance_capital = #{advanceCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
advance_interest = #{advanceInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
advance_time = #{advanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
repayment_actual_time = #{repaymentActualTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
repaymented_time = #{repaymentedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
capital_time = #{capitalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
interest_time = #{interestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paid_total = #{paidTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paid_capital = #{paidCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paid_interest = #{paidInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paid_overdue = #{paidOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paid_compensate = #{paidCompensate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest_start = #{interestStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest_end = #{interestEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest_spread = #{interestSpread,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_user = #{lastUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field1 = #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field2 = #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field3 = #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field4 = #{field4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field5 = #{field5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = now()
where id = #{id}

update loan_pay_plan set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_main_id = #{transMainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repayment_method = #{repaymentMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repayment_total = #{repaymentTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayment_capital = #{repaymentCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayment_capital_time = #{repaymentCapitalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repayment_interest = #{repaymentInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayment_interest_time = #{repaymentInterestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, overdue_days = #{overdueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, period = #{period,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, overdue_interest_total = #{overdueInterestTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, overdue_capital = #{overdueCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, overdue_interest = #{overdueInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, compensate = #{compensate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fees_total = #{feesTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sevice_fee = #{seviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trans_type = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advance_total = #{advanceTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, advance_capital = #{advanceCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, advance_interest = #{advanceInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, advance_time = #{advanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repayment_actual_time = #{interestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paid_total = #{paidTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paid_capital = #{paidCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paid_interest = #{paidInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paid_overdue = #{paidOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paid_compensate = #{paidCompensate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest_start = #{interestStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_end = #{interestEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_spread = #{interestSpread,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_user = #{field5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select lpp.order_no,ltm.city_name,ltm.product_type,ltm.product_name,ltm.borrower, truncate(ltm.amount,2) amount,lpp.repayment_method, truncate(lpp.repayment_total,2) repayment_total, truncate(lpp.repayment_capital,2) repayment_capital,lpp.repayment_capital_time, truncate(lpp.repayment_interest,2) repayment_interest,lpp.repayment_interest_time, lpp.overdue_days,truncate(lpp.overdue_interest_total,2) overdue_interest_total, ltm.lending_time, CONCAT(truncate(ltm.rate,3),'%/',ltm.rate_unit) rate_and_unit, CONCAT(lpp.period,'/',ltm.period_total) period_total_all,luc.company_name from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id where 1=1
order by lpp.repayment_interest_time,lpp.repayment_capital_time
select count(1) from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id where 1=1

select sum(lpp.repayment_total) repaymentTotal, sum(lpp.repayment_capital) repaymentCapital, sum(lpp.repayment_interest) repaymentInterest from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id where 1=1
and ltm.is_advanced='1' and (DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_capital_time,'%y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%y%m%d') or DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_interest_time,'%y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%y%m%d'))

select lpp.id,lpp.order_no,ltm.city_name,ltm.product_type,ltm.product_name,ltm.borrower, ltm.amount,ltm.rate,ltm.rate_unit,lpp.repayment_method,lpp.trans_main_id, lpp.period,ltm.period_total,ltm.paid_period, (lpp.repayment_total-lpp.paid_capital-lpp.paid_interest) repayment_total, (lpp.repayment_capital-lpp.paid_capital) repayment_capital,lpp.paid_capital, lpp.repayment_capital_time,(lpp.repayment_interest-lpp.paid_interest) repayment_interest, lpp.paid_interest,lpp.repayment_interest_time, lpp.overdue_days,lpp.overdue_interest_total,ltm.lending_time, luc.company_name from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id where ltm.is_advanced='1'
AND ( ( (lpp.repayment_capital - lpp.paid_capital)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_capital_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y%m%d')) OR ((lpp.repayment_interest - lpp.paid_interest)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_interest_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y%m%d')) )
order by lpp.repayment_interest_time,lpp.repayment_capital_time
limit #{page.pageStartIndex},#{page.pageSize}

select count(1) from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id where ltm.is_advanced='1'
AND ( ( (lpp.repayment_capital - lpp.paid_capital)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_capital_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y%m%d')) OR ((lpp.repayment_interest - lpp.paid_interest)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_interest_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y%m%d')) )

select * from ( select sum(lpp.repayment_capital)-sum(lpp.paid_capital) as repayment_total, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_capital_time from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id left join bump_dept ld on ltm.field1=ld.dept_id where 1=1
group by ltm.field4,ltm.account_manager UNION select sum(lpp.repayment_interest)+sum(lpp.overdue_interest_total)-sum(lpp.paid_interest)-sum(lpp.paid_overdue) as repayment_total, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_interest_time as repayment_capital_time from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id left join bump_dept ld on ltm.field1=ld.dept_id where 1=1
group by ltm.field4,ltm.account_manager ) total order by total.repayment_capital_time desc
limit #{page.pageStartIndex},#{page.pageSize}

select count(1) from ( select sum(lpp.repayment_capital)-sum(lpp.paid_capital) as repayment_total, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_capital_time from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id left join bump_dept ld on ltm.field1=ld.dept_id where 1=1
group by ltm.field4,ltm.account_manager UNION select sum(lpp.repayment_interest)+sum(lpp.overdue_interest_total)-sum(lpp.paid_interest)-sum(lpp.paid_overdue) as repayment_total, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_interest_time as repayment_capital_time from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id left join bump_dept ld on ltm.field1=ld.dept_id where 1=1
group by ltm.field4,ltm.account_manager ) total

select * from ( select lpp.customer_name, sum(lpp.repayment_capital)-sum(lpp.paid_capital) as repayment_total, ltm.field4, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_capital_time,lci.customer_mobile from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id where 1=1
group by lpp.customer_id UNION select lpp.customer_name, sum(lpp.repayment_interest)+sum(lpp.overdue_interest_total)-sum(lpp.paid_interest)-sum(lpp.paid_overdue) as repayment_total, ltm.field4, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_interest_time as repayment_capital_time,lci.customer_mobile from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id where 1=1
group by lpp.customer_id ) total order by total.repayment_capital_time desc
limit #{page.pageStartIndex},#{page.pageSize}

select count(1) from ( select lpp.customer_name, sum(lpp.repayment_capital)-sum(lpp.paid_capital) as repayment_total, ltm.field4, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_capital_time,lci.customer_mobile from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id where 1=1
group by lpp.customer_id UNION select lpp.customer_name, sum(lpp.repayment_interest)+sum(lpp.overdue_interest_total)-sum(lpp.paid_interest)-sum(lpp.paid_overdue) as repayment_total, ltm.field4, luc.company_name,ltm.department,ltm.account_manager,ltm.provience_name,ltm.city_name,lpp.repayment_interest_time as repayment_capital_time,lci.customer_mobile from loan_pay_plan lpp inner join loan_trans_main ltm on lpp.trans_main_id = ltm.trans_main_id left join bump_union_company luc on ltm.company_id = luc.company_id LEFT JOIN loan_customer_info lci on lpp.customer_id=lci.customer_id where 1=1
group by lpp.customer_id ) total

SELECT order_no,customer_name,repayment_total,repayment_capital,repayment_capital_time,repayment_interest,repayment_interest_time,overdue_days,period,paid_total,paid_capital,paid_interest,'huan' field5 FROM loan_pay_plan lpp WHERE lpp.`status` = '03' AND lpp.create_time > '2018-05-26' AND ( ( (lpp.repayment_capital - lpp.paid_capital)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_capital_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval -2 day), '%y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_capital_time,'%y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day), '%y%m%d')) OR ((lpp.repayment_interest - lpp.paid_interest)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_interest_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval -2 day), '%y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(lpp.repayment_interest_time,'%y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day), '%y%m%d')) ) UNION SELECT order_no,customer_name,repayment_total,repayment_capital,repayment_capital_time,repayment_interest,repayment_interest_time,overdue_days,period,paid_total,paid_capital,paid_interest,'fu' field5 FROM loan_pay_plan_company lppc WHERE lppc.`status` = '03' AND lppc.create_time > '2018-05-26' AND ( ( (lppc.repayment_capital - lppc.paid_capital)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lppc.repayment_capital_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval -2 day), '%y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(lppc.repayment_capital_time,'%y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day), '%y%m%d')) OR ((lppc.repayment_interest - lppc.paid_interest)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(lppc.repayment_interest_time,'%y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval -2 day), '%y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(lppc.repayment_interest_time,'%y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day), '%y%m%d')) )
